laligagate.title: #laligagate
laligagate.intro: is not just a hashtag. It's an alarm, a wake-up call to rethink what kind of internet we want, one governed by the interests of a few or one where digital rights and fair access to content are fundamental pillars.

warning.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è This website is affected by LaLiga blocks
warning.description: This website is among the thousands of URLs blocked by LaLiga in their effort to stop piracy. An indiscriminate block that affects legitimate sites like this one, demonstrating the serious consequences of these disproportionate measures.

problem.title: The problem of massive blocks
problem.description: The judicial blocks requested by LaLiga have resulted in:

points.censorshipDesc: Thousands of domains affected without individual review
points.rightsDesc: Freedom of expression and access to information compromised
points.falsePositivesDesc: News sites, personal blogs and educational projects censored

imageCaption.hayahora: - Tool to track LaLiga's massive blocks and allow any user to verify if a website has been unjustly blocked.
imageCaption.judicial: DIGI message when trying to access content from a blocked IP when there's football.

impact.title: The real impact on my projects
impact.description: This website is a perfect example of the collateral damage caused by these measures. As a developer and content creator, my personal site has been blocked without any relation to sports piracy.

impact.massiveBlocks: Massive blocks don't just affect alleged piracy, but create a domino effect that damages:
